content.query:
--create station dimension table

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'DimStation')
DROP TABLE DimStation

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimStation
(
    StationId INT IDENTITY,
    StationName NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Borough NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    IsHistorical BIT NULL,
    ServiceAvailable BIT NULL,
    WifiAvailable BIT NULL
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)

--create stations staging table

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'StageStation')
DROP TABLE StageStation

CREATE TABLE dbo.StageStation (
    StationName NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    StationComplex NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Borough NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    IsHistorical BIT NULL,
    ServiceAvailable BIT NULL,
    WifiAvailable BIT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);


--load data to stage table
COPY INTO dbo.StageStation
(StationName, StationComplex, Borough, IsHistorical, ServiceAvailable, WifiAvailable)
FROM 'https://mtapipelinestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/files/updated_data/station_data/*parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);

-- SELECT TOP 100 * FROM StageStation;

-- SELECT TOP 100 * FROM StageRides;


--insert data into dimension table

DELETE FROM dbo.DimStation

INSERT INTO dbo.DimStation
SELECT StationName,
    StationComplex,
    Borough,
    IsHistorical,
    ServiceAvailable,
    WifiAvailable
FROM dbo.StageStation

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DimStation ORDER BY StationID;
